words.source: H6213 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'did', ESV 'did', NASB 'did'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H3651 adv. ken 'so, thus'; KJV 'so', ESV 'so', NASB 'so'
H935 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of בּוֹא 'to come, enter'; KJV 'there came', ESV 'there came', NASB 'there came'
H6157 n.ms ʿarov 'swarm (of flies)'; KJV 'a grievous swarm of flies', ESV 'swarms of flies', NASB 'swarms of insects'
H3515 adj.ms kaved 'heavy, severe'; KJV 'grievous', ESV 'thick', NASB 'in great'
H1004 n.ms construct bayit 'house' + dir. he; KJV 'into the house of', ESV 'into the house of', NASB 'into the house of'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H1004 conj. + n.ms construct bayit 'house'; KJV 'into his servants' houses', ESV 'into his servants' houses', NASB 'the houses of'
H5650 n.mp construct ʿeved 'servant' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his servants'', ESV 'his servants'', NASB 'his servants'
H3605 conj. + prep. b- + n.ms construct kol 'all'; KJV 'and in all', ESV 'and throughout all', NASB 'and in all'
H776 n.fs construct ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land', ESV 'the land', NASB 'the land'
H4714 proper name Mitsrayim 'Egypt'; all trans. agree

H776 art. + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land', ESV 'the land', NASB 'the land'
